item.title: Another jackpot surpasses $1 billion. Is this the new normal?
item.description: Remember this moment because it probably won’t last: A U.S. lottery jackpot is projected to soar above $1 billion, and that's still a big deal

item.title: Trump again suggests US should own and control Greenland
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump is again floating his interest in U.S. ownership of Greenland.

item.title: Backpacks containing $1.1 million of cocaine discovered in the wilderness near Canada
item.description: Authorities assigned to a region near the Canadian border in Washington found two backpacks left out in the woods containing an estimated $1.1 million...

item.title: WATCH: Dog goes viral over her love for garbage men
item.description: Maddie’s weekend can’t officially start until her favorite neighborhood garbage men arrive at her home in northern Ireland.

item.title: WATCH: Drone owner helps save dog from frozen lake
item.description: Kishan Patel stepped into action, helping police in Parsippany, New Jersey, rescue a 20-month-old sheepadoodle from a snow-covered frozen lake.
